column3:
@paymog Welcome to Bitcoin Core :)
We don't use terms like LGTM here. We have a list of our "slang" [here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#peer-review).
In your case you probably meant "ACK".
Also thanks for the log

Thank you! Understood, I'll probably make more mistakes as I ramp up on
Bitcoin but I intend to help review and write code.

On Sat, Nov 30, 2019 at 4:08 PM Emil Engler <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @paymog <https://github.com/paymog> Welcome to Bitcoin Core :)
> We don't use terms like LGTM here. We have list of our "slang" here
> <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CON
ACK bd6a24307564a56d54d98331d5e1680d27ddc09e, better to be explicit here
